params.1319:
The Barrows are a series of six burial mounds located in Morytania.

Each of the six Barrows Brothers (Ahrim, Dharok, Guthan, Karil, Torag and Verac) attack with a specific combat style and unique abilities granted by their armour and weaponry.

Attack Styles - Magic, Ranged, Melee
Immunities - None
Slayer categories - None
params.1320:
Mandatory requirements:
- Access to Morytania
- Spade

Combat Achievment task difficulty:
- Easy
- Medium
- Hard
